backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and audio mastering projects with strict access control and CRUD operations for projects.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA install visibility and i18n updates along with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files across styling, components, hooks, audio engine, and i18n modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining root color tokens, dark mode variants, and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point setting up the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, layout, theming, i18n, authentication UI, PWA entry point, and page registration.
frontend/src/audio/engine.ts: Web Audio mastering engine implementing EQ, saturation, compression, limiter, stereo width, and reference-track processing.
frontend/src/audio/metadata.ts: Utility for validating audio file type/size and extracting metadata via AudioContext decoding.
frontend/src/audio/presets.ts: Defines the MasteringPreset interface and provides a collection of audio mastering presets with EQ, compression, limiter, saturation, stereo width, and gain settings.
frontend/src/audio/wavExport.ts: Exports processed audio to WAV by building an offline mastering chain using the selected preset and returning the rendered audio as a Blob.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout flow and displays an auth button with status-based UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter a profile name and saves it via API hooks.
frontend/src/components/HelpFAQ.tsx: Displays a localized FAQ section with questions and answers using the appâ€™s i18n system.
frontend/src/components/i18n/LanguageSwi: Provides a dropdown menu to switch between supported languages using the i18n system.
frontend/src/components/projects/Project: Lists user projects with preset names, timestamps, and delete actions, handling localization and API integration.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallEntryP: Shows a button to trigger PWA installation when supported, with localized labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags. Includes helper functions to create an AuthClient and restore stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjects.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, create, and delete mastering projects via an actor API, with automatic cache invalidation. Handles error propagation and actor availability checks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallVisibili: Tracks PWA install availability, installation state, and triggers the browser install prompt. Detects standalone installation and reacts to install events.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to load and save the caller's user profile through an actor API, integrating with React Query. Manages loading state and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Implements an i18n context storing the current language and translations, persisting the language in localStorage. Provides a hook for accessing the translation context.
frontend/src/i18n/presets.ts: Defines localized preset names and descriptions for each supported language. Maps preset keys to translation objects.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains full translation dictionaries for English and Portuguese covering UI strings. Also defines types for language and translation structures.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exports a simple hook that returns the i18n context for accessing translations and language control.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and design tokens, defining color variables and themes for light and dark modes. Includes custom utility styles like waveform gradients and glass effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the root App component and imports global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the landing page with hero and workflow sections, localized text, and navigation logic based on authentication. Displays marketing content and a CTA to start using the app.
frontend/src/pages/MasteringStudio.tsx: Main studio page handling audio upload, metadata extraction, mastering engine setup, reference track loading, playback modes, and export flow.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining typography, container settings, theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata and roadmap containing versioning, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues for the mastering platform.
